title: New study reveals United States a top source of plastic pollution in ...
body: October 30, 2020 New study reveals United States a top source of plastic pollution in coastal environments by Ocean Conservancy A beach in Panama covered in litter. Credit: Ocean Conservancy

summary:
The sentiment from the conversation about banning plastic straws seems to be leaning towards support for the ban, which is a positive sentiment. The general belief is that banning plastic straws would have a positive impact on the environment.
